content: Hey! Just a heads up that I'm pushing out some inventory I've been sitting on for a while that's depended on by log while I get back into working on it, while also putting together a PR that should make it less likely I'll accidentally break things in the future (I done goofed and misunderstood how 1.x.x-alpha would be treated by semver). If it causes any breakage I'll do a swift cargo yank.

So far it all looks ok: https://github.com/rust-lang/log/pull/465

I'll keep an eye on the issue tracker though :eyes: If anyone does suddenly find themselves with broken builds let me know!
